messages.speech:
-For a cloud based solutions in countries where it is supported: Spark Call (https://www.ciscospark.com/products/spark-call.html)
-For an on-premise voice focused solution based on a Cisco Integrated Services Router: Cisco Communications Manager Express (http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/unified-communications/unified-communications-manager-express/index.html)
-For an on-premise full collaboration (voice/video/conferencing/edge traversal/contact center/messaging) with the option to integrate with Spark message/meet in the cloud: Cisco Business Edition 6000 (http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/unified-communications/business-edition-6000/index.html)
